choices.answer: Washington was appointed the General of the Colonial Army
Native American tribes joined the war in support of British

the British navy suffered an embarrassing defeat

the French ambushed a British detachment near Quebec City.
both French and the British wanted the Ohio River valley.

questions.question: Which of the following was not a cause of the American Revolution?

choices.answer: The United States declared independence.
The colonists were over taxed.
The British were bullied by the colonists.
The Boston Massacre.

find new overseas markets.
